description: I. The Merchant Shipping (Prohibition of Smoking on Ships) Regulations 2009-consultation draft. 6 p. II. Impact assessment of prohibition of smoking on ships: intervention and options. 8 p. III. Dear consultee letter dated 09/07/2009 from Rachael Watson regarding the draft Regulations to prohibit smoking on ships. Incl. annexes. 6 p. IV. Sample fixed penalty notice for Regulation 10-offence of smoking in a smoke-free place. 4 p.
